channel.title: Skyrim
channel.description:
Can't believe there isn't already a thread for this... Skyrim is going to be the best RPG ever, imo (or on consoles, atleast). I'm getting it for 360 and cannot wait, so I've decided to replay Oblivion again to pass the time. :) Who here is getting it?
Here's a play through by some guy who got Skyrim early: http://www.gameanyone.com/game/X360/12235.html (Has 12 parts, 20-30 minutes each. If you want to stay in the dark until Skyrim is released, I highly recommend not watching these). Part 6 doesn't have any real spoilers, just some epic gameplay.
Some gameplay: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lr8aFY6gDLg http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uXZEHqxRR50

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

zyle1992:

Has anyone else experienced problems while playing on the X360? I’ve had textures not render, and the console crashing when switching from one zone to the next.

Yes actually, for some reason last night the ground texture was just completely black and it was definitely not my television.

Read full topic

lol

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

zyle1992:

Has anyone else experienced problems while playing on the X360? I’ve had textures not render, and the console crashing when switching from one zone to the next.

If you have installed it to your harddrive then uninstall it, as it causes quite a few bugs. They’re trying to release a patch for it but who knows how long that will take.

http://videogamewriters.com/dont-install-skyrim-to-your-xbox-360-hard-drive-just-yet-29288

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:84, topic:420001”][quote author=Frell link=topic=522557.msg3818776#msg3818776 date=1321578294]
Thats not the problem. Excess saves are confirmed to cause lag over time, clean out old ones to keep the game running fast.
[/quote]
I only have 2 saves. One data for my sister’s account and one for mine. Then maybe like 2 or 3 autosaves. Why does it lag excessively when I am on a horse?[/quote]Your character mite be too fat.

Read full topic

It seems more like the problem lies within the game. It’s not designed to run fast on consoles for long periods. I usually start getting lag about 5 hours into the game.

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Man fuck this game it’s turning my friends into nerds

“lets chill” “skyrim”

“lets go rippin on fourwheelers” “skyrim…”

“lets work on our sleds” “skyrim…”

They’re not even gamers in the slightest. Wtf has happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

I played on apprentice, but then I moved back up to Adept. It still seems really easy but I get destroyed if I try to play any higher.

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

What difficulty are you guys playing on? I was playing on Adept but I encountered a wild dragon at level 7 and pretty much got my ass kicked ~8 times in a row, so I moved down to Novice. I killed the dragon, then decided it was tooooooo easy, so now I’m on apprentice.

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Game is horribly addicting, so hard to just stop playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:74, topic:420001”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=522557.msg3817626#msg3817626 date=1321488804]

Next generation consoles are becoming more desperately needed…

^^^^This so much. I remember when the PS3 was regarded as the best computer. Now it is quite mediocre compared to computers with the i7 processor.

Lol, the PS3 still owns the i7 at multitasking. A quad core can’t beat 8 individual processors…
[/quote]
I am not the best computer literate person (;)), but when you open task manager on my sister’s computer it shows 8 CPU’s. All with different percentages of usage, and she has a i7 processor. If those aren’t individual processors, what exactly are they? Like I said, not the best with computers. :P[/quote]
Hyper-threaded CPUs.

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

The Wanderer:

Has anyone played Skyrim on the PS3? It lags constantly when riding on my horse and the trees consist of 4 sides. It is horrible. All of the foliage is actually textures. I went from playing on the PC to the PS3 and I was highly disappointed.

It just lags like fuck all the time. I try to ignore it.

Read full topic
